name: Multi-Platform Digital Banking Solution with Azure Automation
description: Comprehensive digital banking transformation implementing automated Azure Landing Zone, RPA workflows, and data analytics for fraud detection and customer verification to modernize banking operations and enhance security.
challenge: Manual processes requiring automation through Azure Landing Zone implementation and RPA/Power Automate workstreams. Need for automated identification of fake customers and addresses to prevent fraud and defaults in the FinTech platform.
solution: Implemented automated Azure Landing Zone with web UI and API-based integration reducing manual effort. Deployed Power Automate based automation in HR operations and data processing. Built data analytics solution with automated identification of fake customers, addresses, and information to identify defaults and fraudulent entries.
outcomes: Cost reduction through process optimization and automation
Process improvement with quick risk identification capabilities
Automated monthly/quarterly/yearly/ad-hoc reports in risk area
Automated data quality checks eliminating manual effort
Significant time savings from previously time-consuming manual processes
teamSize: Azure specialists and data analytics experts
